title: 10 to 15 perches brand new houses for sale at Thalawathugoda
details:
Dear Sir / Madam.

we have brand new houses for sale at Thalawathugoda. , pelawatta and Battaramulla area.

10 to 15 perches land extends and 2000 to 3200 square feet houses are available.

All the house are architectural designed with 04 bedrooms and attached bathrooms,serven rooms. pantry, Kitchen, visiting, dinning etc...

price range 23 to 40 million . Price can be negotiate.

Sample of pictures hereby attached for your reference.

Please call for more details.

Regards
Dilan
